item.title: [ICRA-21] Task Planning with a Weighted Functional Object-Oriented Network
item.description: TL;DR – In this paper, we attempt to execute task plan sequences extracted from FOONs. Since these sequences may contain actions that are not executable by a robot, we introduce a human assistant in planning, and the robot and assistant work together to solve the task.
